reviews.comment: The membership test `p.id in published_ids` is inefficient because `published_ids` is a list. This results in a linear scan for each post, leading to a time complexity of O(n*m) where 'n' is the number of posts and 'm' is the number of published IDs. For large lists, this can cause significant performance degradation. To optimize this, convert `published_ids` to a set before the list comprehension to leverage its O(1) average time complexity for lookups, which would improve the overall performance to O(n+m).

title: feat: Add published posts filter
body: Implemented filtering to show only published posts from a list.
